tool_description: Manages patient communications throughout the recruitment and screening process, tracking outreach attempts, responses, and scheduling follow-up activities.

communication_type.description: Type of communication (initial_contact, follow_up, appointment_reminder, screening_results, consent_scheduling)

message_content.description: Content of the message or communication

contact_method.description: Method of communication (phone, email, sms, mail)

error_messages: Invalid communication type: Use one of [initial_contact, follow_up, appointment_reminder, screening_results, consent_scheduling].
Invalid contact method: contact_method must be one of [phone, email, sms, mail].
Invalid urgency level: urgency_level must be one of [low, normal, high, urgent].
Empty message content: message_content must contain the communication text.
Patient ID not found: The specified patient_id does not exist in the system.
usage: Specify patient_id, communication_type, message_content, and contact_method. Set urgency_level if different from normal. The tool logs the communication and schedules any required follow-up.

communication_id.description: Unique identifier for this communication record

next_contact_date.description: Recommended date for next contact attempt
